website_summaries.verdict: Choose this eyeliner if you love dramatic looks and prefer a liquid formula that stays put once dry. However, if you are new to liquid pens, it may take you a while to learn to use it.
pros: This liquid eyeliner is made to last and can provide up to 24 hours of wear
Pen has a fine felt-tip applicator that's designed for drawing crisp, dramatic winged eye looks
cons: Slightly messy to apply and learning how to control it to create precise lines take a little trial and error

customer_reviews.title: Completely dried up on receipt
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed, was looking forward to trying this product. Mine was totally dried up. Couldn't even get it to show up on a white piece of paper. Would still like to try it. Maybe I'll do some research and find a bric and mortar store where I can try before I buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mamaw

customer_reviews.title: This was not at like the original Nars eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: This was not at like the original Nars eyeliner. This has been the only liner I have used for 2 years and the two I ordered look like the real thing but they are not . Both smear and do not go on well . I had to go and buy them again at the Nars counter . BEWARE
customer_reviews.author: Tiffanydawn

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: I've tried lots of different kinds of eye liner, and this is my favorite. It goes on with great control, stays on as long as you like - honestly - doesn't feel itchy or flake off or anything bad. Both the black and the blue are rich and lovely. And I love the design visually, my favorite favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Trutti

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: When I received this item it was all dried up, ver unhappy😭
customer_reviews.author: Kym Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend!
customer_reviews.text: The eyeliner was unusable . It was completely dried out. The box it came in looked and worn. Will not order again!
customer_reviews.author: June Murphy

customer_reviews.title: The applicator tip is gear and I love the color
customer_reviews.text: The applicator tip is gear and I love the color. It's a Brown-Gray color that is not too overwhelming on the eye.
customer_reviews.author: Shawnapm

customer_reviews.title: This is probably a good product...
customer_reviews.text: ...but mine came pretty much dried up. That is a lot of money to pay for something that really won't work. I have had Nars products before and loved them. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: dianne

customer_reviews.title: Great staying power!
customer_reviews.text: This liner stays in place and has great color options. I have also used the blue shade. You will need eye makeup remover to get all of it off. I love the fact that I can put it on in the early morning and it stays fresh looking all day. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Best black eyeliner on the market
customer_reviews.text: I've tried them all and this is by far the best. Easy to apply with precision. Great for cat-eye look.
customer_reviews.author: DMP

customer_reviews.title: Read my review if you choose the Koala color
customer_reviews.text: The eyeliner itself seems to be good. But I gave 3 stars only because the koala color in reality is almost black while the picture of it looks lighter. I have gray-green eyes and the black color is way to intense for me that's why it so important for me to find the right shade. This eyeliner is not going to work for me because it's so dark. Other than that - I would say this is a good eyeliner. I liked its staying power and it was easy to use it. It looks mat, no shine at all which I personally liked.
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner is easy to apply (felt tip), dark black, buildable (thin or thick), and is incredibly good for drawing cat eyes. I think I'm sold and never going back to other liners. I'm not sure how it holds up in terms of durability (staying moist, tip holding form), but the liner itself lasts long when its on your eyelids, so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: HannP

customer_reviews.title: NARS has great products!
customer_reviews.text: I use the NARS products because there are no surprises. They function and perform as advertised. This color is very nice, too. I like a light touch when using eye make-uo, and the Style fits the bill, perfectly. Easy to control, will not rub off or smear.
customer_reviews.author: B. Carmichael

customer_reviews.title: Easy for a Spaz like me
customer_reviews.text: I have no patience or skill at putting on eye liner, but like to do eyeliner instead of mascara. I tried Nars in black and loved it, so easy and smooth to use, like a fine tip marker, so i got it in blue as well. Wish it came in a dark green and in a dark purple as well.
customer_reviews.author: Scollina

customer_reviews.title: barely leaves a mark
customer_reviews.text: this is an awful pen that was dry and extremely light when attempting to use it. I use lancome artliner and expected this pen to actually contact black "ink". I ended up throwing it away..
customer_reviews.author: Emalstrom

customer_reviews.title: Not Easy
customer_reviews.text: What I read about this product implied it went on your eyelids smooth as silk. NOT! It skipped, it dragged it was bad. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Legalsissy

customer_reviews.title: Colour?
customer_reviews.text: This is a lot "bluer" than I realised. Very bright and concerned that it could stain my eyelids. Haven't tried it yet - little bit apprehensive.
customer_reviews.author: RED61

customer_reviews.title: Waste of $$
customer_reviews.text: I was never able to use this product, maybe once and It dried up on me. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: myrna prins

customer_reviews.title: product drys out after about a week
customer_reviews.text: I've used some of the best eyeliners out there. I had such high hopes for this product. I ended up returning it after a week's use. It wasn't stunning when I first got it but after using it for several days it began to drastically dry. I was shocked. The drug store ones I've had for months still have yet to dry up. Very disappointing. On a better note, the Nars blush and matte lip stick I ordered are out of this world.
customer_reviews.author: shewita

product_meta.title: Nars Eyeliner, Koala, 0.7 Fluid Ounce
product_meta.description: Color:KoalaA modern liquid liner that ensures a flawless even line with just one stroke. Features a super-fine tip for precise definition and versatile application options.
feature_bullets: A modern liquid liner that ensures a flawless even line with just one stroke
Features a super-fine tip for precise definition and versatile application options
